channel.title: Software Engineers on Bitperi(Periklis Gkolias)
channel.description: Recent content in Software Engineers on Bitperi(Periklis Gkolias)

item.title: Dear Technical Recruiter...
item.description: I like you. I really do. I understand that not all my colleagues feel the same way but I have positive feelings for the work you do. I understand the value of doing a good match between a company and the various candidates. It is a very old problem (not only in modern workplace) which needs solution, thus every help is acceptable. Though, you seriously need to… Stop asking for excellent knowledge Yeap, I said it.
